devdoc.details: A basic DAO contract with proposal creation, voting, and execution capabilities

addMember(address,uint256).details: Add a new member to the DAO (only admin can add members initially)

emergencyWithdraw().details: Emergency withdraw (only admin) - for initial setup phase

executeProposal(uint256).details: Execute a proposal after voting period ends

getTotalVotingPower().details: Get total voting power of all members

hasVoted(uint256,address).details: Check if an address has voted on a proposal

removeMember(address).details: Remove a member from the DAO

devdoc.title: SimpleDAO
